participant_1.background:
I value my collection of Celtics memorabilia.
i love to read fantasy novels and poetry.
I prefer to eat alone at a quiet restaurant, where I can enjoy my meal and my thoughts.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.
i like vintage furniture.

participant_2.background:
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.
i love going to concerts on the weekend.
I like to dress well and be well-groomed.
I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog.
I keep in touch with my family a lot.

content.text: Hey there, what are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, listening to music and watching some videos. What about you?
I'm currently reading a book. It's a fantasy novel.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love reading fantasy novels. Do you have any favorite authors?
I do! I really like J.R.R. Tolkien and Terry Pratchett.
Those are great authors! I love Tolkien's work. I haven't read much of Pratchett's, though.
You should! His Discworld series is really good.
I'll have to check it out. I'm also a big fan of Neil Gaiman. Have you read any of his books?
I have! I loved American Gods and The Graveyard Book.
Those are two of my favorites! Have you read any of his other books?
I've read Anansi Boys and Coraline. I've also seen the movie adaptations of those books.
Those are both great books! I've seen the movie adaptations of American Gods and Coraline, too.
We have similar taste in books!
